backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: shopping cart with badge, cart modal with WhatsApp checkout, four-product catalog, and hero section with gradient text and CTAs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing component responsibilities, state management, styling, and integration patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system, light/dark theme variables, and global base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with FontAwesome CDN link and page title for Veer Mahadev Plastic wholesale shopping center.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component orchestrating navigation, hero, product sections, footer, chatbot, and cart modal with shared cart open/close state.
frontend/src/components/BestSellers.tsx: Best sellers section displaying three products in a responsive grid with images, descriptions, best-seller badge, and WhatsApp inquiry links.
frontend/src/components/CartModal.tsx: Right-sliding cart modal showing cart items with remove buttons and WhatsApp checkout that constructs order message from cart contents.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: Interactive chatbot with bouncing bubble trigger, expandable chat window, keyword-based responses about pricing and address, and 800ms bot reply delay.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Dark footer with business details, GST registration notice, WhatsApp/phone contact icons, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with dark-overlay background image, gradient text heading, subtitle about wholesale supply, and CTAs for viewing products and WhatsApp chat.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar component with brand logo, smooth-scroll menu buttons (Home, Products, About), WhatsApp order link, and a shopping cart icon with item count badge.
frontend/src/components/ProductCatalog.t: Product catalog grid displaying four plastic products (buffer plates, marriage combo, food containers, silver foil) with images, descriptions, wholesale pricing, and add-to-cart buttons.
Featured product showcase for the Marriage Full Combo Pack with image, pricing (â‚¹1,999 with 23% discount), product details, and a WhatsApp order button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store for managing shopping cart state with methods to add, remove, clear items, and retrieve cart count and items.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login status, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating all functionality is handled client-side with no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, brand colors (red accent), Poppins font, and custom animations for product cards.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom color palette using OKLCH color space, brand-red variants, custom border radius, shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting an e-commerce landing page for Veer Mahadev Plastic wholesale business with 13 product categories, WhatsApp ordering integration, shopping cart functionality, and mobile-first responsive design using Tailwind CSS. Includes architectural notes on sticky navigation, cart modal with localStorage persistence, chatbot interface, and required product images with specific dimensions.
